Subclasses of BlockWriter in com.clarkparsia.common.io.block
 class HTMLBlockWriter
          Deprecated. This class is not robust at all and should not be used for the reasons explained above.
 class TextBlockWriter
           Concrete implementation of BlockWriter for purely textual output like console output.
 

Methods in com.clarkparsia.common.io.block that return BlockWriter

          Begins a new block for alignment.
 BlockWriter BlockWriter.endBlock()

 BlockWriter BlockWriter.printSpace()
          Prints one space.
 BlockWriter BlockWriter.printSpace(int n)
          Prints n spaces.
 BlockWriter BlockWriter.printTab()
          Prints space as many times as specified by the tab size.
